# script.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(test_project)

find_package(EICrecon REQUIRED)
find_package(spdlog REQUIRED)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD ${EICrecon_CXX_STANDARD})

# Automatically determine source file list.
file(GLOB mysourcefiles *.cpp *.cc *.c  *.hpp *.hh *.h)
set( test_PLUGIN_SOURCES ${mysourcefiles} )

# Create plugin
add_library(test_plugin SHARED ${test_PLUGIN_SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(test_plugin ${JANA_LIB} ${ROOT_LIBRARIES} spdlog::spdlog)
set_target_properties(test_plugin PROPERTIES PREFIX "" OUTPUT_NAME "test" SUFFIX ".so")

# Install plugin USER_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY is set depending on EICrecon_MY envar.
install(TARGETS test_plugin DESTINATION ${USER_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY} )
